metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14534 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In VideoLAN VLC media player 3.0.7.1, there is a NULL pointer dereference at the function SeekPercent of demux/asf/asf.c that will lead to a denial of service attack.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Antonio Morales from the Semmle Security Team

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
